description: The meeting - supposedly on constitutional reform - comes amid two months of opposition protests.
title: Belarus protests: Lukashenko holds meeting with opponents in jail
title_page: Belarus protests: Lukashenko holds meeting with opponents in jail - BBC News
maintext: A short video clip shared by the press service also shows Mr Lukashenko saying to the group: "I am trying to convince not only your supporters but the whole of society that we need to look at things more broadly."
